eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 02:27 AM ON SEP 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:37 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Silver Alert has been issued for The Mesa Police Department.  The Mesa Police Department is looking for 78 year old Sadia Patterson.  Sadia is a black female, 5 feet 2 inches tall, 124 pounds, with brown eyes and black hair.  Sadia was last seen wearing a black and white checkered shirt.  Sadia was last seen on foot on September 20th, 2025, at 1900 hours, in the 1600 block of South Stapley Drive.  She suffers from a medical condition which may cause her to become confused and easily lost.  If you have seen Sadia, please contact the Mesa Police Department at 480 644 2211 or call 911.
If you have contact with this Silver Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
